text: Ros Ramona Qadira binti Mohd Zamzam (born June 25, 1990) is a Malaysian actress who works in television and film. She was a contestant of Dewi Remaja 2009/10.Mohd Al-Qayum Azizi (19 Februari 2018). “Janganlah Serius Sangat…” - Ramona Zamzam mSTAR Online. Reached March 20, 2018. == Personal life == Ramona is a Malay from Pakistani, German and Thai was born in Bukit Mertajam, Penang and grew up in Ipoh, Perak.Biodata Ramona Zamzam Azhan.co (8 Mac 2018). Dicapai pada 23 Mac 2018. She is the eldest of two siblings.Siti Azira Abd. Aziz (24 Oktober 2011). Ramona Amalkan Petua Kecantikan Ibu mSTAR Online. Dicapai pada 6 Julai 2018 At the age of four, she was sent to a Chinese school. She holds a degree in business at SEGI College (now SEGi University). Zamzam married Palestinian man Rami Alashkar on May 1, 2015.Zaidi Mohamad (1 Mei 2015). Ramona Zamzam sah bergelar isteri Berita Harian. Diperoleh pada 1 April 2018.Zaidi Mohamad (1 April 2015). Ramona Zamzam nikah 1 Mei bukan 15 Mei Berita Harian. Diperoleh pada 10 April 2015.Siti Athirah Dzulkifly (10 Mei 2015). Ramona Zamzam lega sudah jadi isteri Utusan Malaysia. Diperoleh pada 10 Mei 2015. The couple have a daughter, Ivanna Alashkar.Ivanna Alashkar Nama Anak Ramona Zamzam Astro Gempak (8 Januari 2018).
